entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022
